messages.message: Hello folks! I'm starting the UAT-dogfood split. UAT will be unavailable for about an hour.

OK, UAT is back up and running on Postgres! UAT's controlplane database has also been migrated to the same Postgres instance.

There was a minor hiccup with the network egress policies for the Postgres port (5432) (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/31292), but I got it sorted.

I'll continue to monitor, but everything looks stable!

For controlplane folks: I'll going to hibernate the old controlplane mysql database to ensure it's not being used anymore. I'll keep the instance around for a week or two as insurance.
